mapper.select: select comnum, comtitle, membernickname, comcontent, com_re_ref, com_re_lev, com_re_seq, comviews, comdate, memberEmail from (select row_number() over (order by com_re_ref desc, com_re_seq asc) num, B.* from community B where memberEmail = #{memberEmail} order by com_re_ref desc, com_re_seq asc) where num between #{row1} and #{row1}+9
select count(*) from community where memberEmail = #{memberEmail}

select ad_num, ad_title, membernickname, ad_content, ad_re_ref, ad_re_lev, ad_re_seq, ad_views, ad_date from (select row_number() over (order by ad_re_ref desc, ad_re_seq asc) num, B.* from advertisement B where memberEmail = #{memberEmail} order by ad_re_ref desc, ad_re_seq asc) where num between #{row1} and #{row1}+9
select count(*) from advertisement where memberEmail = #{memberEmail}
